text: As-salāmu ʿalayki yā mumtaḥanatu imtaḥanaki alladhī khalaqaki qabla an yakhluqaki wa kunti limā imtaḥanaki bihi ṣābirah
Wa naḥnu laki awliyāʾu muṣaddiqūn wa likulli mā atā bihi abūki ṣallallāhu ʿalayhi wa ālihi wa sallam
Wa atā bihi waṣiyyuhu ʿalayhis-salām muslimūn
Wa naḥnu nasʾaluka allāhumma idh kunnā muṣaddiqīna lahum an tulḥiqanā bi-taṣdīqinā bi-d-darajatil-ʿāliyyah
Li-nubashshira anfusanā bi-annā qad ṭahurnā bi-wilāyatihim ʿalayhim as-salām
title: Syeda Fatima Zahra (sa) - short 1
